casebody.data:
SILAS MASON COMPANY, INC., WALSH CONSTRUCTION COMPANY, ATKINSON-KIER COMPANY, PETITIONERS, v. THE UNITED STATES [No. 44659] [105 C. Cls. 27;

329 U. S. —]

Government contract; jurisdiction; plaintiffs not entitled to sue where administrative procedure agreed to in contract as to settlement of disputes is abandoned without justification.

Plaintiffs’ petition for writ of certiorari denied by the Supreme Court October 14, 1946.
